trans-unit.source: The Language feature allows to edit the language and text direction attributes of an element in the RTE editing area.
trans-unit.target: Die Sprachfunktion erlaubt es, die Attribute für Sprache und Textrichtung eines Elements im RTE zu bearbeiten.

trans-unit.source: "Left to right" icon in the editor tool bar. "Right to left" icon in the editor tool bar. "Show language marks" icon in the editor tool bar.
Select the language of the contents of the element.
trans-unit.target: Wählen Sie die Sprache der Inhalte dieses Elements.

trans-unit.source: The language selector box may appear in the RTE toolbar and in some dialogues. The selector shows the language currently assigned to the current element, if any. Selecting a language assigns it to the element. If a language was already assigned to the element, it is replaced by the newly selected language. Any currently assigned language may be removed by selecting the "Remove language mark" item at the top of the list of the selector box.
Select the direction of text within the contents of the element.
trans-unit.target: Wählen Sie die Textrichtung im Inhalt dieses Elements aus.

trans-unit.source: The text direction selector box may appear in some dialogues. The selector shows the direction of text currently set on the current element, if any. Selecting a direction sets it on the element. If a direction was already set on the element, it is replaced by the newly selected direction. Any currently set direction may be removed by selecting the "Not set" item at the top of the list of the selector box.
